WSUS32 KKCI 170255 
SIGC  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET...NONE 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 170455-170855 
TS ARE NOT EXPD TO REQUIRE WST ISSUANCES.
==

WSUS31 KKCI 170255 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 6E 
VALID UNTIL 0455Z 
FL CSTL WTRS 
FROM 80SSE CEW-70SW TLH-150SSW TLH-130S CEW-70S CEW-80SSE CEW 
AREA EMBD TS MOV FROM 26030KT. TOPS TO FL310. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 170455-170855 
AREA 1...FROM 70ENE CHS-130SE ILM-70ESE MIA-60ENE EYW-40ESE 
SRQ-50NW ORL-50SSW SAV-70ENE CHS 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM 70SSW CEW-60SSW TLH-40WSW CTY-80W PIE-160S 
CEW-70SSW CEW 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
==

WSUS31 KKCI 170255 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 7E 
VALID UNTIL 0455Z 
FL AND FL GA CSTL WTRS

AREA EMBD TS MOV FROM 24030KT. TOPS TO FL300.
